Token.Abstract: This class provides a CoreData based implementation of UpsightDataStoreInterface
This method always returns the same data store object. If you wisht to create a new instance of UpsightDataStore use one of the init methods rather than using the shared object.
Returns an object that implements the UpsightDataStoreInterface protocol using CoreData

Parameter.Name: directoryURL
Parameter.Abstract: An NSURL pointing to the folder where you would like the SQLite file to be saved

Parameter.Name: prefix
Parameter.Abstract: The .sqlite will be added to this string and the result used as the name of the data base file

ReturnValue.Abstract: And object conforming to the UpsightDataStoreInterface protocol

Token.Abstract: Returns an object that implements the UpsightDataStoreInterface protocol using CoreData

Parameter.Name: aDataStoreURL
Parameter.Abstract: An NSURL identifying the full path and name of the file in which the datastore should be saved
